name: Card Age
description:
"Card Age" is a casual, idle game that simulates management from the perspective of God

Game introduction

Survive and develop in an exquisite world composed of a variety of cards, gradually unlock new technologies, build industrial assembly lines and face various interesting challenges, and build your own card era.

Main content of the game

● Purchase card packs in the element store


● Open card pack


● Use residents to process and synthesize materials


● Construct buildings with different functions


● The battle between residents and enemies


● Complete era tasks and conduct era deduction

Game duration: It takes about 8-10 hours to complete the classic mode for the first time.

Game Features

● Novice teaching mode, classic mode, free mode, challenge mode for selection
● Auto archive
● Residents get food automatically every month, no waiting time
● Each resident has an independent attribute. Gaining experience points and improving related attributes during work and battle will determine the different occupations of the resident
● Unique warehousing and logistics system, easy to organize your card world
● Support Steam Workshop

Other

● Save frequently to prevent loss of game progress

We are committed to improving players’ gaming experience. If you encounter any problems during the game or have any suggestions, please leave feedback in the discussion area. Thanks!
